plugins.name: WCAG 色彩对比检查 WCAG Color Checker
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin helps you evaluate the contrast ratio between text and background colors in your design frames, ensuring they meet WCAG accessibility standards. Perfect for designers aiming to improve readability and accessibility.


Function Introduction

•Check text-background contrast ratio within selected frames.

•Evaluate contrast according to WCAG standards (AAA, AA, A, Fail).

•Visualize contrast results and interact with your design directly.

•Automatic identification and highlighting of areas needing improvement.


Usage

1.Select a frame in your Figma file.

2.Run the plugin and click “Check Contrast.”

3.Review the results, which are sorted by contrast ratio.

4.Click on any result to highlight and improve specific text elements.


Notes

•Ensure text layers are properly named for better result identification.

•The plugin currently supports checking text against solid color backgrounds only.

•For best results, use the plugin on well-structured design frames.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件帮助您评估设计画板中文本与背景颜色之间的对比度，以确保其符合 WCAG 无障碍设计标准。非常适合希望提升可读性和无障碍性的设计师。


功能说明

•检查选定画板中文本与背景的对比度。

•根据 WCAG 标准评估对比度（AAA、AA、A、Fail）。

•可视化对比度结果并直接与设计交互。

•自动识别和突出显示需要改进的区域。


使用方法

1.在 Figma 文件中选择一个画板。

2.运行插件并点击“检查对比度”。

3.查看按对比度排序的结果。

4.点击任一结果以突出并改进特定的文本元素。


注意事项

•确保文本图层正确命名，以便更好地识别结果。

•插件目前仅支持检查与纯色背景的文本对比。

•为获得最佳效果，请在结构良好的设计画板上使用插件。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quickly check and improve contrast ratios in Figma frames with one click.

plugins.name: Grid Forge
plugins.description:
Grid Forge is a powerful Figma plugin that revolutionizes table creation by using your existing design system components. With intelligent auto layout, flexible width settings, and advanced data mapping, Grid Forge helps teams create responsive, consistent tables in seconds.


Use your own header and cell components, ensuring brand and Ul consistency. Configure columns with FIXED, HUG (with minimum width), or FILL modes, and instantly preview changes in

real-time.


Import data via CSV or Excel, map multiple fields per component, and watch as Grid Forge intelligently applies your design system to every table row saving time and maintaining design integrity across complex Uls like dashboards and forms.
plugins.tagline: Create responsive tables using your design system components, auto layout, and real data

plugins.name: Rename by text list
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you rename multiple layers in bulk using a text-based list.

Simply select two Auto Layout frames:

  1. One containing the elements to rename (any layer type)
  2. One containing text nodes with the desired names

The plugin will rename each element in the first frame using the corresponding text content from the second frame, based on their order in the layers panel.

  3. 対象オブジェクトの選択：プラグインを起動し、テキストを適用したいグループやコンポーネントを選びます。
  4. 入力と適用：レイヤー名とテキストを入力して、「適用」ボタンをクリックします。

plugins.name: 液态玻璃生成器 Liquid Glass Generator
plugins.description:
介绍

Liquid Glass 是一款帮助设计师快速创建液态玻璃风格 UI 效果的 Figma 插件，可模拟现代界面中常见的毛玻璃、层叠光影等质感表现。


功能说明

•一键生成包含背景模糊、渐变描边和透明填充的液态玻璃容器

•支持调节透明度和模糊强度

•自动叠加纹理图层，增强真实感

•创建位置自动居中显示在当前视图中心


使用方法

1.在 Figma 插件菜单中运行 Liquid Glass

2.设置透明度和模糊参数

3.点击 Apply 按钮生成液态玻璃框

4.自动居中展示，可根据需要自由拖动或组合使用


注意事项

•推荐用于浅色或模糊背景下，视觉更佳

•可与其他 UI 元素组合使用增强表现力

•在复杂画布上运行时可能略有延迟


Introduction

Liquid Glass is a Figma plugin for designers who want to create realistic glassmorphism UI effects effortlessly. It simulates the layered, frosted, and glowing look commonly seen in modern interfaces.


Function Description

•Adds a liquid glass style frame with background blur, angular stroke, and gradient fills

•Includes configurable opacity and blur settings

•Adds optional layered texture for enhanced realism

•Automatically centers the effect on your current viewport


How to Use

1.Run the plugin from the Figma plugins menu

2.Adjust opacity and blur in the popup panel

3.Click “Apply” to generate a liquid glass frame

4.The generated element appears centered in your viewport


Notes

•Works best on light or blurred backgrounds

•You can group the frame with existing UI elements

•Performance may vary with complex canvases

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Create beautiful glassmorphism effects instantly

plugins.name: АвтоГрамоты | AutoGramoty
plugins.description:
Зачем нужен?

Если ты устал заполнять кучу грамот-сертификатов-благодарностей вручную, то этот плагин спасет тебя.

Несколько нажатий вместо нескольких часов


Как пользоваться?

  1. Добавьте маркер в виде текста {{ФИО}} на фрейм
  2. Выделите весь фрейм
  3. Запустите АвтоГрамоты
  4. Введите текст маркера
  5. Введите значения
  6. Нажмите "Создать"


Предложения принимаются в личке


How to use?

  1. Add a marker in the form of text {{KEY} to the frame
  2. Select the entire frame
  3. Launch AutoGramoty
  4. Enter the marker text
  5. Enter the values
  6. Click "Create"

plugins.name: Image Uploader
plugins.description:
Transform Figma design into HTML and CSS is a powerful Figma plugin that helps you convert your Figma designs into clean, responsive HTML and CSS using AI model capabilities. With an intuitive multi-view UI inside Figma and a backend server that fetches image previews and processes visual data into code, This plugin empowers developers and designers to rapidly prototype web interfaces without manual slicing or coding.


Usage instructions


Prerequisites

  1. Node.js installed
  2. An OpenAI API key
  3. A Figma Personal Access Token (PAT)
  4. A Figma file with share access


Setup

npm install express openai dotenv node-fetch cors archiver


Set Environment Variables:

  1. Create a .env file in your project root with:
  2. OPENAI_API_KEY=your_openai_key


Run the Backend Server:

node server.js

This starts a local server at: http://localhost:3000

  1. Using the Plugin (UI inside Figma)
  2. Upload the plugin manifest and code.js + ui.html in Figma’s "Plugins > Development > New Plugin".
  3. Run the plugin from within Figma.
  4. On first view, click "Upload Figma File" to navigate to the second screen.
  5. Paste the Figma file URL and Figma API Token, then click Submit URL.
  6. A preview gallery of Figma frames will load. Click a thumbnail to select one.
  7. Preview the selected frame in the third view. Click Submit to generate code.


Output

The backend sends the image to OpenAI GPT-4o for code generation.


You receive a downloadable generated-ui.zip with:

html/

index.html

css/

styles.css

plugins.name: Flow Linker
plugins.description:
In large-scale design projects, prototyping every screen-to-screen interaction isn’t always practical. With dozens or even hundreds of screens, building interactive flows becomes time-consuming and sometimes infeasible, especially when deadlines are tight or priorities shift.


Yet developers and stakeholders still need clarity. They rely on understanding how different screens connect, what the logical flow of a user journey looks like, and where transitions happen even without full prototypes.


That’s where Flow Link comes in.


Rather than investing hours in building out detailed prototypes, Flow Link lets you visually map out interactions using clean, orthogonal connectors. These lines don’t just show flow—they’re configurable, styled, navigable, and reusable. And with frame linking, viewers can even jump directly to connected screens, making your Figma file interactive in structure, even without full prototyping.


Flow Link fills the gap between rapid design iteration and clear developer handoff making complex projects more navigable, understandable, and scalable.
plugins.tagline: Your Figma Flow, Made Effortless.

plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

plugins.name: 清除/隐藏切片 Clear or Hide Slice
plugins.description:
介绍

清除切片 Clear Slice 是一个高效的图层管理插件，可一键清理选区内的所有 Slice 图层，并提供隐藏/显示控制选项。适用于批量处理切图冗余、整理输出前的画板。


功能说明

  1. 清除选中范围内所有 Slice 图层
  2. 可选是否解除组件实例后再处理
  3. 支持隐藏和显示 Slice 图层
  4. 多操作入口，灵活控制图层状态


使用方法

  1. 选择任意 Frame、Component 或 Instance
  2. 打开插件，勾选是否解除组件实例
  3. 点击所需操作按钮（清除 / 隐藏 / 显示）
  4. 插件将自动处理所有嵌套 Slice 图层


注意事项

  1. 若组件为受保护实例，请先手动解除
  2. 操作不可撤销，建议操作前先保存版本
  3. 插件默认递归处理所有子图层


Introduction

Clear Slice is a lightweight utility plugin that helps you remove, hide, or show all Slice layers within selected elements—ideal for cleaning up export slices before delivery.


Function Description

  1. Remove all Slice layers in the selection
  2. Optional: auto-detach instance before processing
  3. Hide or show Slice layers instead of deleting
  4. Simple UI with precise layer control options


How to Use

  1. Select any Frame, Component, or Instance
  2. Open the plugin and toggle "Detach instance" as needed
  3. Click your desired action: Clear / Hide / Show
  4. The plugin processes all nested slices recursively


Notes

  1. Protected components may require manual detaching
  2. Changes are not reversible — save your work before use
  3. The plugin processes all child layers in depth

plugins.name: Artboard Theme Switcher
plugins.description:
A lightweight plugin for switching between light and dark themes while preserving your design work.


Hierarchical Color System

Automatically adjusts section colors based on nesting depth. Parent sections use your defined colors, while child sections receive calculated brightness adjustments (-10 for light mode, +10 for dark mode per level).


Frame Protection

Multi-layer protection ensures frames, components, and instances are never modified. Only page backgrounds and sections are affected.


Performance Optimized

48KB bundle with sub-200ms execution time. Uses efficient HSB color calculations for smooth operation.


How Hierarchical Coloring Works

  1. Light Mode: Child sections get progressively darker (-10 brightness per nesting level)
  2. Dark Mode: Child sections get progressively lighter (+10 brightness per nesting level)


This creates visual depth automatically without manual configuration. Frame content and designed elements remain completely protected.

accepted.name: Anmol Kumar
accepted.description: i skip meals to design stuff ✷

plugins.tagline: Easily Switch Between Dark and Light Colour themes for your Figma Pages and Sections

plugins.name: Section Template Manager

Section Template Manager streamlines your daily workflow in FigJam by automatically duplicating template sections with today's date. Perfect for teams who use FigJam for daily stand-ups, retrospectives, or any recurring activities.

• One-click duplication - No UI, just instant action

• Automatic dating - New sections are named with today's date (YYYY-MM-DD)

plugins.name: 文案提取与替换 Text Extractor & Replacer
plugins.description:
介绍

文案提取与替换是一款高效实用的 Figma 插件，可快速提取选中元素中的文本，并支持批量修改与一键替换，适用于多语言版本设计、内容本地化与运营迭代场景。


功能说明

  1. 提取选中节点中的全部文本内容
  2. 自动合并重复文案并展示唯一列表
  3. 可逐条输入替换文案
  4. 支持一键替换全部或单条替换
  5. 支持复制原文案、一键恢复初始值
  6. 替换后自动更新当前原文显示


使用方法

  1. 选中一个或多个页面元素
  2. 点击【📋 提取选中文案】，展示全部原文案
  3. 输入对应的替换内容
  4. 点击【替换】按钮应用更改（可单条或全部替换）
  5. 点击【复制】获取原文，或点击【恢复】重填初始内容


注意事项

  1. 插件执行替换前需加载原文字体（已自动处理）
  2. 替换仅影响文本内容，不修改字体样式
  3. 替换基于精确匹配，请确保输入一致
  4. 请在提取前确保已选中有效节点


Introduction

Text Extractor & Replacer is a practical Figma plugin designed to help you quickly extract and batch replace text from selected elements—ideal for multi-language design workflows, localization, and content iteration.


Function Description

  1. Extract all text from selected nodes
  2. Display a unique list of original strings
  3. Edit replacements in a unified interface
  4. One-click replace for individual or all text
  5. Copy original text and restore initial values anytime
  6. Auto-update "original" label after each replacement


How to Use

  1. Select one or more elements in your Figma file
  2. Click 📋 Extract Text to list all unique texts
  3. Input replacement values next to each entry
  4. Click Replace (per-row or globally) to apply changes
  5. Use Copy to copy source text or Restore to revert input


Notes

  1. Font loading is required before text replacement (handled automatically)
  2. This plugin only replaces text values, not font styles
  3. Replacements are based on exact match
  4. Make sure to select nodes before extraction

137672.description:
介绍

文案提取与替换是一款高效实用的 Figma 插件，可快速提取选中元素中的文本，并支持批量修改与一键替换，适用于多语言版本设计、内容本地化与运营迭代场景。


功能说明

  1. 提取选中节点中的全部文本内容
  2. 自动合并重复文案并展示唯一列表
  3. 可逐条输入替换文案
  4. 支持一键替换全部或单条替换
  5. 支持复制原文案、一键恢复初始值
  6. 替换后自动更新当前原文显示


使用方法

  1. 选中一个或多个页面元素
  2. 点击【📋 提取选中文案】，展示全部原文案
  3. 输入对应的替换内容
  4. 点击【替换】按钮应用更改（可单条或全部替换）
  5. 点击【复制】获取原文，或点击【恢复】重填初始内容


注意事项

  1. 插件执行替换前需加载原文字体（已自动处理）
  2. 替换仅影响文本内容，不修改字体样式
  3. 替换基于精确匹配，请确保输入一致
  4. 请在提取前确保已选中有效节点


Introduction

Text Extractor & Replacer is a practical Figma plugin designed to help you quickly extract and batch replace text from selected elements—ideal for multi-language design workflows, localization, and content iteration.


Function Description

  1. Extract all text from selected nodes
  2. Display a unique list of original strings
  3. Edit replacements in a unified interface
  4. One-click replace for individual or all text
  5. Copy original text and restore initial values anytime
  6. Auto-update "original" label after each replacement


How to Use

  1. Select one or more elements in your Figma file
  2. Click 📋 Extract Text to list all unique texts
  3. Input replacement values next to each entry
  4. Click Replace (per-row or globally) to apply changes
  5. Use Copy to copy source text or Restore to revert input


Notes

  1. Font loading is required before text replacement (handled automatically)
  2. This plugin only replaces text values, not font styles
  3. Replacements are based on exact match
  4. Make sure to select nodes before extraction

manifest.name: 文案批量提取与替换 Text Extractor & Replacer

137672.tagline: Quickly extract and replace text in bulk with ease

plugins.name: 文本样式导出器 TextStyle Exporter
plugins.description:
介绍

一键提取当前文件中的本地文本样式名称与对应的 key，便于跨文件引用和样式管理。


功能说明

  1. 获取当前 Figma 文件中所有本地文本样式
  2. 显示每个文本样式的名称与唯一 key
  3. 支持一键复制或查看 key，用于开发或样式映射


使用方法

  1. 打开包含本地文本样式的设计文件（建议为团队样式库）
  2. 选中任意节点（或不选中）并运行插件
  3. 点击“获取样式列表”按钮，即可查看所有样式及其 key


注意事项

  1. 插件仅能提取“本地文本样式”，不支持远程团队样式
  2. 请确保文件具有编辑权限，否则无法读取样式
  3. 建议在样式库文件中使用本插件效果最佳


Introduction

Quickly extract all local text style names and their unique keys from your current Figma file — ideal for style management and developer use.


Function Description

  1. Retrieve all local text styles in the current file
  2. Display each text style’s name and corresponding key
  3. Supports easy reference for cross-file usage or developer integration


How to Use

  1. Open the design file containing local text styles (preferably a team library)
  2. Run the plugin — selection is optional
  3. Click the “Fetch Style List” button to display names and keys


Notes

  1. Only local text styles are supported, not team styles from other files
  2. Ensure the file is editable to allow style access
  3. Recommended usage: in a shared style library file for best results

plugins.tagline: Export local text styles with name and key

plugins.name: 字号缩放工具 (专业版) Font Size Scale (Pro)
plugins.description:
介绍

【字号缩放工具 (专业版) Font Size Scale (Pro)】是一款高级 Figma 插件，可帮助设计师精确快捷地缩放文本字号，有效提升设计工作效率。


功能说明

本插件提供两种缩放模式：连续缩放与阶梯缩放。连续缩放通过比例调整文本字号，而阶梯缩放则允许按固定数值（例如增加或减少 1、2、3）对字号进行调整。此外，对于包含文本的画板、组或框架，插件还会自动在名称后追加缩放后缀，方便后续管理。


使用方法

1.选择包含文本的图层、画板或组。

2.通过点击不同的 Tab，选择“连续缩放”或“阶梯缩放”。

3.在连续缩放模式下，通过滑块调整缩放比例；在阶梯缩放模式下，通过自定义数字输入控件输入步长数值。

4.点击“应用缩放”按钮来执行操作。

5.请确保所有所需的字体均已加载。


注意事项

•请确保选区中包含文本节点。

•本插件支持单个文本层以及含文本的容器。

•在对大范围设计进行缩放时，请注意可能引起的布局调整。


Introduction

Font Size Scale (Pro) is an advanced Figma plugin for scaling text sizes with precision and ease. It enables designers to update text sizes quickly, streamlining your design workflow.


Function Description

This plugin provides two scaling modes: continuous scaling and step-wise scaling. The continuous mode adjusts font sizes by a ratio, while the step-wise mode increases or decreases font sizes by fixed increments. In addition, any frames or groups that contain text are renamed with a suffix that indicates the applied scale change.


Usage

1.Select the text layers, frames, or groups you wish to scale.

2.Choose the desired scaling mode by clicking on the corresponding tab.

3.For continuous scaling, adjust the scale ratio via the slider; for step-wise scaling, use the custom number input to specify the step value.

4.Click the “Apply Scale” button to perform the scaling operation.

5.Make sure that all necessary fonts are loaded.


Notes

•Ensure that your selection includes text nodes.

•Both standalone text layers and containers that hold text are supported.

•When scaling large designs, review your layout as some adjustments might affect the overall design consistency.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Step-wise font scaling for pro design.
